snippet: In the exhibition “State of Mind” at the Berkeley Museum of Art, California’s 1970s conceptual art scene, in which ideas were emphasized more than objects, makes a return visit.
lead_paragraph: In the exhibition “State of Mind” at the Berkeley Museum of Art, California’s 1970s conceptual art scene, in which ideas were emphasized more than objects, makes a return visit.

headline.seo: California’s 1970s Conceptual Art Comes Home to Berkeley Museum of Art
headline.main: Back to the ’70s, When a Traffic Jam Could Be Art
headline.print_headline: Back to the ’70s, When a Traffic Jam Could Be Art

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Berkeley Art Museum and Pacific Film Archive
